  1. Tags
  2. ButtonTag

ButtonTag

Components and Properties

Button

on-click

UIAction

UIAction that will fire on click

click-event

event

Event that will fire on click

Aliases:

  • click-event
  • event-click

interactable

bool

Whether or not the button is clickable

ContentSizeFitter

horizontal-fit

FitMode

How the width is controlled

vertical-fit

FitMode

How the height is controlled

Glowable

glow-color

color string

The color of the glow (“none” for no glow)

HorizontalOrVerticalLayoutGroup

spacing

float

Space between elements

child-expand-width

bool

Whether or not to force the children to expand to fill additional available horizontal space.

child-expand-height

bool

Whether or not to force the children to expand to fill additional available vertical space.

child-control-width

bool

Whether or not to control the width it’s chidlren

child-control-height

bool

Whether or not to control the height it’s chidlren

LayoutElement

ignore-layout

bool

Whether or not to use layout element.

preferred-width

float

The preferred width this layout element should have before additional available width is allocated.

Aliases:

  • preferred-width
  • pref-width

preferred-height

float

The preferred height this layout element should have before additional available height is allocated.

Aliases:

  • preferred-height
  • pref-height

min-height

float

The minimum width this layout element should have.

min-width

float

The minimum height this layout element should have.

LayoutGroup

pad-top

float

Top padding

pad-bottom

float

Bottom padding

pad-left

float

Left padding

pad-right

float

Right padding

pad

float

Padding for all directions

child-align

TextAnchor

The alignment to use for the child layout elements in the layout group.

RectTransform

anchor-min-x

float

The normalized x position in the parent RectTransform that the lower left corner is anchored to.

anchor-min-y

float

The normalized y position in the parent RectTransform that the lower left corner is anchored to.

anchor-max-x

float

The normalized x position in the parent RectTransform that the upper right corner is anchored to.

anchor-max-y

float

The normalized y position in the parent RectTransform that the upper right corner is anchored to.

anchor-pos-x

float

The x position of the pivot of this RectTransform relative to the anchor reference point.

anchor-pos-y

float

The y position of the pivot of this RectTransform relative to the anchor reference point.

size-delta-x

float

The width of this RectTransform relative to the distances between the anchors.

size-delta-y

float

The height of this RectTransform relative to the distances between the anchors.

hover-hint

string

Text that will appear when a pointer hovers over

TextMeshProUGUI

text

string

Text to display

font-size

float

Size of font

font-color

color string

Color of font

Aliases:

  • font-color
  • color

face-color

color string

Face color of font

outline-color

color string

Outline color of font

outline-width

float

Width of font outline

rich-text

bool

Whether or not to enable rich text

font-align

TextAlignmentOptions

How to align the text

Aliases:

  • font-align
  • align

overflow-mode

TextOverflowModes

How to handle text overflow

bold

bool

Whether or not text is bold

italics

bool

Whether or not to italicize text

underlined

bool

Whether or not to underline text

strikethrough

bool

Whether or not to strikethrough text
